Reviews.Title: Good phone but some downsides
Reviews.Author: xxeno
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone, except it doesn't come with a front facing camera. Love the fact that its dustproof and water resistant and comes with scratch resistant screen. My problem when I got this phone was that it's headset didn't work with the phone which is both odd and frustrating since I use the headsets alot when I'm on the go. That alone makes this for me at least, a bad buy since the accessories should be compatible with it. Factory unlocked is great since I can use this phone with any carrier and it is a fast phone, haven't seen any lag times in switching screens and apps.

Reviews.Title: Love the phone but...
Reviews.Author: Janzen
Reviews.Content: This phone is great for my needs, the water and dust resistance is amazing! But these guys sent me the Chinese version...I now own a Chinese wall plug for my phone...compleatly worthless. At least it charges via USB as well and it wasn't difficult to change the phone to English settings, the other plus is I now know how to use it to text Japanese, but really wish that they would have at least specified on the page because now I have to wait a week for a USA friendly plug that I ordered to come in and had to pay some extra cash for it. Other than that, this phone is gorgeous, came in great condition, and meets all the specs. Doesn't lag, nice camera, and super cute and thin!

Reviews.Title: Just what I expected
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I got the phone from HassleFreeCell, fast shipping, the photo is a "xperia s" but as the title say you will get your "xperia go", in the box a "Stereo Headset MH410c" even a  microsim adapter and what may be confused by a chinese wall plug is a "Quick Charger EP881" you can google it to find more about, I think thats the only con even so HassleFreeCell sent me an adapter for that in the sheath (nice touch) but it was a poor quality one, it didn't work for me. About the phone, is all you heard about it, im happy with my purchase.EDIT: 2014 More than a year have passed, the actualizations mess up the phone, forums are full with problems little help from Sony, the thing i hate the most I can't have a long conversation with it it reaches 40ºC and is uncomfortable to hold it next to your ear, and just 512mb of Ram... yes is water proof but it have usb conectivity issues after upgrade, camera is slow, i have to wait like 30 sec to make a call.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely LOVE this phone
Reviews.Author: D Lowe
Reviews.Content: This is hands down overall the best phone I've ever had.  Being an active person I've taken this thing mountain biking, paddleboarding,canoeing, skateboarding, and running and it's still going!  It's been thrown around quite a bit and has survived many falls where I expected to pick up a shattered screen and it didn't even have a scratch.  The camera takes high quality pictures and videos.  Android runs really well and is definitely the way to go with all the different apps for all I do (cars, bikes, finances, music, knitting).  I don't use data too often but when I do it's always there when I want it and it looks very sleek and elegant (not what you'd expect with this level of durability).  Definitely unique as well, I haven't seen anybody else with an Xperia and I've had 2.  If you're active and looking for a phone that won't slow you down this is it!  My only minor gripe is Sony's weird female jack they use which isn't always compatible with the controls on some headsets.  Just find the right one that has an adapter like I did and you're good!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone | Good battery | Fast processor | Really water and dust proof
Reviews.Author: HOMERO ALMEIDA
Reviews.Content: The phone is great, i really have no much to say about it. The touchscreen is very sensitive, the battery life is good (about 2days of semi-constat usage), The processor is pretty good, doesn't freeze with games or other stuff.The only thing about this phone that people most of the times don't know is the difference between ST27i and ST27a. They work in different bands. Take a look below and ask your carrier which band they work on.ST27i  - HSDPA 900 / 2100ST27a - HSDPA 850 / 1900 / 2100

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Jorge Valero
Reviews.Content: Very good cel, good feature,excellent camera, really waterproof and the battery life is very good it last for 2 days

Reviews.Title: LEFT OUT INFORMATION
Reviews.Author: joseph
Reviews.Content: ALL US USERS. This phone does NOT work on U.S. 3g networks or anything higher and they DO NOT specify that on the product you will have to get internet settings manually and it will only run on the EDGE network which is the OLD cell phone internet from like 10 years ago.  The internet is so slow even at full bars that all the HD streaming and internet page features the phone has to offer become useless.  BE AWARE OF THIS BECAUSE THEY WILL NOT ADVERTISE IT.  Even though they put that it works in every state in the world they wasnt talking about the 3g network they only mean the phone usage.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, very good quality, exactly the same expected
Reviews.Author: Renzo J. Cast A.
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very good quality, exactly the same expectedI Love It / Excellent / Very Good / Very Good Quality

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Manuel Sanz
Reviews.Content: Completely satisfied with the product purchase. Excellent quality and speed when sending the article. I recommend it. I have tested and reviewed the product and I have not had anything that disappoint.

Reviews.Title: wonderful the phone
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: Acquired the phone to my cousin, once I get the saw and began to handle him seemed easy and very practical for its internal memory so you can download the applications you need is very happy. And recommends the product ..

Reviews.Title: Good equipment and great care
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: Excellent service from seller, arrived in very good condition.Very good team, take great pictures missing only faster when taking the photo as it takes a lot with autofocus. Supports the water but does not display option under water and to take photos should the timer. I recommend the phone, responds fast.

Reviews.Title: SONY XPERIA
Reviews.Author: Andrew B. Allsopp
Reviews.Content: The product is excellent. I was just a bit concerned that the item was not delivered within the specified time. However, i realize that it came from quite a distance. It is understandable, therefore, whyit didn't arrive exactly on time.Otherwise I have no problem.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Cellphone
Reviews.Author: Francsico Ruiz
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, it is very good, water and shock resistant, perfect for my children, I recommend it and its Android system is excellent

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Mishelle
Reviews.Content: the product meet my expectations. I recomend this product. I like it, it is what i want it. thank you

Reviews.Title: Good phone destroyed by a flawed software update
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: While not being a top of the range model, the phone is good enough for my needs. It is fast enough and looks sturdy.EDITION (1/27/2014):The latest software patch is overloading the RAM memory of the phone and it has become sluggish and unresponsive overnight, not even being able to handle phone calls properly and making most apps unusable.Sony does not allow to go back to older android versions, and if you try to start over from factory settings it will automatically update to the latest version.Do not buy it. It was okay but the software change has morphed it into an expensive paperweight.

Reviews.Title: Muy bueno!!!!!
Reviews.Author: estefania monsalve
Reviews.Content: Un teléfono muy bueno. Reistencia insuperable y diseño súper cómodo!!!Lo recomiendo para aquellos que son muy desastrosos y descuidados. Ideal para cuando los niños lo toman en un descuido y es perfecto contra sus mordeduras!!

Reviews.Title: A lot in a small package.
Reviews.Author: Adriana Oliart
Reviews.Content: Very good product. Does what is advertised, very fast, great pictures. Compact size. Durable. Ideal for outdoor sports and activities.

Reviews.Title: Conforme con mi compra
Reviews.Author: Deivymar Perdomo
Reviews.Content: Excelente equipo.Supera las caracteristicas del Sony Ericsson ARC.La cámara tiene muy buena resolución y la bateria dura bastante

Reviews.Title: Horrible light leak issue
Reviews.Author: viceversa
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd purchase and both phones so far have the light leak issue.  Basically, at an angle, you can see a horizontal light leaking at the top edge of the screen.  According to Sony support, this isn't normal BUT several other users have noticed this issue with the screen.Sony really needs to focus on quality control instead of releasing 10 different phones every few months.The phone itself is pretty good for what it is.  Perfect "fit in your pocket" phone.  Thin and very light weight.  The rubberized backing is nice.  No need to slap on a tacky case to protect the phone.This would have been a great phone if Sony decides to ever fix the screen issue, increase the ram to at least 1gb, and make it a IPS screen.The phone comes with Gingerbread.  Runs pretty smooth with it.  When upgrading to ICS, several users complained that the phone is now lagging.  Not surprised here since the phone has about 512mb ram.  There are talks of Jellybean coming to this device.  But not exactly how sure it will work with such as tiny amount of ram.Sony really cut corners on this phone.  Corporate should realized that consumer are willing to PAY for a good phone.  Instead of using a cheap screen with light bleed issues, 512mb ram, low res display, etc etc.  Also the camera is crap under low light conditions.  The camera doesn't have to many features from what I can see.  No burst mode, no effects, just point and shoot and call it a day.I returned both phones due to the light leak issue.  I will be waiting for the Xperia Go 2 and see if Sony implements some major upgrades.This phone is not with $250.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: Shipped quickly. Good service. As advertised. Fully satisfied. Not bulky. Responsive. Tough. Water resistant. Light. Wotrth every single dollar. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Best buy
Reviews.Author: Jorge Andres Sanchez Loaiza
Reviews.Content: It is too early to say that the resists smartphone, but it is a beautiful and fast phone, I have no complaints whatsoever

Reviews.Title: this phone are cool
Reviews.Author: Douglas Mora
Reviews.Content: I need likely one external button for click the camera, is fast, ergonomic, small, i like it because it is the power of size

Reviews.Title: little big problem
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo
Reviews.Content: The screen is kind of lifting off from a side causing a small glitch on the screen. Would like to read any recommendation on how to fix~

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: goud610
Reviews.Content: I have been using Sony (Ericsson) phones for almost 10 years and this phone meets the same standards.User friendly interface and a very good music player.Not very good camera compared to other high end phones but takes decent photos.Now up-gradable to ICS (and soon Jellybean next year).I haven't tried its water resistance but it survived a 6 feet fall on a concrete road with very minor scratches on edges.Using it on AT&T; network ; since this is an international (Greece) version, you might have some hard time configuring for Data (relatively less support from both AT&T; and Sony Mobile Customer care in USA)Highly recommend this phone if you are on tight budget and doesn't want to deal with 2 year agreements.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: I'm so exited with mmy new Xperia Go, really a great phone, fast and elegant. I had a little trouble because it was delivered without bill and I'm from Venezuela, but after all I had my new cellphone before new year.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Luiz M N
Reviews.Content: Great cell, fast, powerful, slim body and so light. Liked so much. The sound could be better but I think it is something related to the sealed body, as it is well protected from water and dust.Used the cell with water in display without any problems. I had a Motorola Defy before and with water on display it went nuts as it "recognized" the water drops as a touch/input on the screen.Dual core makes it fast and ICS update is available but I do not recommend as it will decrease the performance.For the price, protection and quality I definitely recommend and say it is the best in category.

Reviews.Title: Sony experience
Reviews.Author: AHMET MURATOGLU
Reviews.Content: Easy to start using . Phonebook management is a bit complicated . Have not tested water resistance , so no comments yet on that part . Very light compared to my iPhone .

Reviews.Title: Need Ac adapter for US costumers
Reviews.Author: tatilopez
Reviews.Content: I can't understand if it is an International Version,it did not came with ac adapter for Us customers.At least it should be posted in the Ad that it is an european version !

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected from SONY.
Reviews.Author: Phillip Heyes "Pressgang Rally"
Reviews.Content: Not a terrible phone by any means but not an excellent phone either. Speed was not a strong point with this product. I did like how tough it was to break after dropping it down stairs and throwing it in water she is still kicking !

Reviews.Title: An ok smartphone
Reviews.Author: JcGilmour.ca
Reviews.Content: Until I updated this phone to Android 4, this was a fast phone. Camera is so slow as to be pretty much useless. Generally the user user interface is always lagging.Likes: good features like built in voip sip. The WiFi actually appears to work, handing off to appropriate access points as required. It appears to be reasonably rugged but I wouldn't take it swimming on purpose.Wants: being unlocked and Worldly, it would have been nice to host two sim cards.

Reviews.Title: fast and safety
Reviews.Author: Daniel Teran "Daniel Teran"
Reviews.Content: la compra se realizo en el tiempo indicado y la calidad del producto ofrecida por el vendedor fast and secury

Reviews.Title: genial
Reviews.Author: Jose Moreno
Reviews.Content: un smartphone a todo terreno, basta de preocuparme que le pueda pasar a mi cel, ya no hay limites :D

Reviews.Title: Great phone, but for a that kind of smartphone the camera is very bad!!!
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: It's a great phone, the IP67 protection is the reasson I bought this phone and meet the expectation, great quality of the product and it has Android so this is not an issue in this smartphone.I have to say that also i bought this phone for the camera, Sony has very good cameras and in this phone the camera is very very BAD!!! It doesn't have an image stabilization and you have to take a lot of pictures to have just one in good quality.

Reviews.Title: no warranty
Reviews.Author: fla
Reviews.Content: Agent Jason:  Once one of our devices get physical or liquid damage the warranty get lost.it was the answer went I ask my warranty because the phone is dead after you took some pictures under water.Agent Jason:  I can suggest to try sending the phone to a 3rd party repair center as the phone no longer have warranty with us.It is a water proof phone without warranty when you use it under water!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: MUCHAS GRACIAS, RECIBÍ Y ME ENCANTO..TODO BIEN .DESDE VENEZUELA.MARACAIBO
Reviews.Author: Carolina Navea R
Reviews.Content: MUCHAS GRACIAS, RECIBÍ Y ME ENCANTO..TODO BIEN .DESDE VENEZUELA.MARACAIBOMUCHAS GRACIAS, RECIBÍ Y ME ENCANTO..TODO BIEN .DESDE VENEZUELA.MARACAIBOMUCHAS GRACIAS, RECIBÍ Y ME ENCANTO..TODO BIEN .DESDE VENEZUELA.MARACAIBO

Reviews.Title: Ridiculous specs
Reviews.Author: Advo
Reviews.Content: This Sony is just WAY behind the times technologically. It stacks up badly against the old Defy Plus, AND is more expensive (approx. 50 dollars more).The biggest problem is that it has a display of 320 x 480 pixels against 480 x 854 on the Defy, which is completely ridiculous and makes it useless for web-browsing.It has a tiny battery of 1350 mAh vs. 1700 mAh on the Defy. And it comes out with an obsolete OS (2.3). Maybe it'll be updated, some day. But in late 2012 you can't launch new products with a two-year-old OS.Yes, the CPU of the Sony is dual-core, but with that low-res screen, it hardly benefits from it.Frankly, bringing this phone out, and at this price, is an insult to consumers.

ProductInfo.Features:
Display - Scratch-resistant glass - 320 x 480 pixels, 3.5 inches
Internal Memory - 8 GB storage (4 GB user available), 512 MB RAM
Camera - 5 MP, 2592 x 1944 pixels, autofocus
OS - Android OS, v2.3 (Gingerbread), planned upgrade to v4.0
CPU - Dual-core 1 GHz Cortex-A9
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Xperia Go ST27i Black IP67 certified Factory Unlocked International Version by New Generation Products LLC.,
